Question
========

A person achieves a score of 14.9 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 16.6 with a standard deviation 0.8. The z-score of the person with 14.9 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* -3.31
* -2.13
* -1.24

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 3.31: Incorrect
-2.13: Correct
-1.24: Incorrect
